Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: kknudsen
Reviews.Content: I don't usually write reviews, but this camera is review worthy.  I must say that it is MUCH smaller than I pictured and I agree with the other reviewers that the case is much too large for the camera.  I use the case to hold the charger for this camera and another camera I have.  I went on Amazon and ordered a zippered Roo case for the camera which is smaller and much more of a better fit.  This camera is so easy to use! The image stabilazation is awesome! I was shooting a video and wanted to test the stabilization so I shook the camera, upon playback there was just a mild wave.  Also, the 1080i recording makes it look as if you are watching the action again in real life; it is crystal clear!  This camera has a multitude of options for picture taking.  I've tried out a few and find them very easy to use and they add just a touch of art to your picture.  The HDR mode on this camera is Stellar!  It just makes the photo's POP!  I think this is a great camera for the average person who is just trying to point and shoot.  I also feel this camera is great for an intermediate, like myself, or even an expert because it allows you to adjust the settings to your preference.  I was lucky enough to get this package on sale for $150, but I still would have bought it for it's full price of about $200.  If you're looking for a compact camera that packs a lot of punch you've come to the right place!

Reviews.Title: Lots of features with a small price tag
Reviews.Author: BIGthor
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as I saw another one that was purchased by my brother a few months back and loved the features.I have to day, this camera is little but huge in features. I was married with the Canon cameras as I thought that they had the best quality, but it was a nice surprise that Sony is in the competition with these little ones.Ok the pictures, I have tested the sweep mode in all kind of environments, indoors and outdoors and the pictures look great, the normal pictures with no flash are also great. This is the first camera that I buy on this price range that I can call it intelligent, the auto mode identifies faces on its own, if you want to take macro pictures, it will take them without changing the settings or modes.The touch screen is very responsive and the Carl Zeiss lens are perfect, the menu is very intuitive to the point that have not read the manual and I still get really good pictures.I would recommend this camera to anyone that likes taking good quality pictures but is not very savvy on photography or cameras and you can get really good results.The bundled case is a little big for this camera, but hey, it is free and feels like it will protect it quite well.The only bad thing is that it does take almost 2hous to charge the battery but after that, you can take more than 200 pictures without a charge.

Reviews.Title: First Impression - Nice Camera - Camera pouch is too big
Reviews.Author: Shailender
Reviews.Content: Just opened the box. Overall really nice and small camera took some pics to test it out. Overall i am satisfied with my purchase. However 2 things to note: The camera pouch offered here is too big for such a small camera defeats the purpose of carrying such a small camera. I can fit my old thicker camera in it. Secondly the camera charger does not come with the external camera charger it is an adapter that connects to your  camera for charging. Thankfully i have a spare external charger from my lost sony camera. Do order a spare battery. Will post an update in another 1 month to let you all know how it survives.

Reviews.Title: this little thing is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Tamera Thomas "littleclaws"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little point & shoot. It's almost impossible to take a bad photo & it has cool shooting modes like 'toy camera' and 'pop color' which are really fun. It works great in darker conditions & I've gotten some amazing shots.I believe it has a good design & the violet color is really beautiful. It's tiny & takes up almost no space in my purse so i can keep it on me 24/7!I don't think you'll be disappointed with this powerful little point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Arlo A. Finney "arlo"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a couple of weeks and for the most part it fills the bill. It is a trifle slow in its being able to shoot multiple shots in a short time. There is a lag between shots that may irritate purists. I like the wide angle and the telephoto capabilities and also the movie ability.The camera is a little small to handle with large hands but can be carried and/or hidden easily and is VERY light weight.Excellent focusing and picture detail is what this camera offers and the display is just terrific. You can select almost anything to add your photo results.The operating guide that came with the camera was short on how to import photos to a computer. I had to check the Sony web site for the information for MacIntosh. The USB cable can be used to charge the battery and is also used to input photos to a computer. This is good.

Reviews.Title: DSCWX70 review
Reviews.Author: ILuvHiDef
Reviews.Content: When a camera case is bundled with the camera (i.e., they make you buy the case), it should at least be the case for that camera. Not some "too large" case they want to dump. That's the case here (pun intended). I've since purchased the Sony LCS-CSVA leather case and it fits much better (although still a little too large).On the plus side, the photos are extremely sharp (noticeably better than my older Sony P&S;). And, its incredibly small and light weight. The only issue I have with the camera so far is that the zoom control is "touchy". It zooms too quickly so its hard to easily make small changes. However, overall, I'm very satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: wx70 compared to wx7
Reviews.Author: okramer
Reviews.Content: I actually had the wx-7 for about 4 months till it fell and was run over by a bike..Was happy with the wx-7 but the wx-70 was cheaper so decided to go for it.Bought it and am very happy with it.It is a bit slower cause of the touch screen but other than that it's more or less the same.I do however think it takes better pictures of kids in motion.The video is amazing in both cameras.All in all - a good camera for this price.

Reviews.Title: Great LITTLE camera
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: I don't have much to add as others have said, this is a great little camera.  Just read these and other professional reviews throughout the web.  I also have a 5yr old Cannon Elf and this Sony (yes newer) is much more intuitive.  The only complaint is also its strength, its so small.  This is kinda of an issue not from an operation point but from the 3" screen size.  The Sony screes is smaller than the Cannon Elf 3" screen.  I like looking at my pictures and videos on the camera.  Guess I need to buy one with a 3.5" screen.  That said, I am happy with the camera.  I worried about the responsiveness of the touch screen but this screen touch/sensitiveness seems fine to me.  Other professional reviews said the same, they're right.  Another thing, get a film cover for the screen because it scratches easily, most do.  I put the camera in my pocket with my keys and scratched it up a little (the 1st time I used it!).  The protection film I put on it has little affect on the camera's operation.  I used an extra screen protector film I had for my Cannon.  although its a little bigger it works fine.  Haven't tested it in all light conditions and all that... but stills and video for golf, tennis, around the house it is just great.  That's all folks...Forgot to mention, this camera has a proprietary usb connection which means if you loose this one you have to buy one from Sony for relatively big bucks...  I hate things likes they are unnecessary is this worth dinging one star to three...?

Reviews.Title: Not bad, but so far not outstanding.
Reviews.Author: datahut
Reviews.Content: Am updating this review as have more experience with product.  As mentioned in first review almost a year ago, took this camera to a Las Vegas trade show after gaining basic familiarity.  I'd previously been using a 6 year old Nikon Coolpic with 4mp resolution.  On automatic settings found too many pictures were out of focus or poorly exposed.  Camera decided to trigger flash in circumstances where it shouldn't have overexposing the shot, so manually disabled it.  Pictures that did come out well though have brilliant color and resolution.However, a year and a lot of travel later (as of 7/2013), still contend for my taste this thing can not make decisions fast or well enough to consistently match the basic quality of pics taken with old Nikon (even with resolution set to 10mp). To me a good shot in focus from old technology with faster acquisition is better than the occasional great shot in focus from the new.  This is not a good buy to me for casual but varied conditions.  Get something cheaper or more expensive that you've seen sufficient results for your shooting circumstances to be satisfied with.  Will use it as my back-up for travel.  If it gets stolen, no big deal.

Reviews.Title: Loving it
Reviews.Author: Georgia Mom
Reviews.Content: I am replacing my ELPH that I had for years that finally became unpredictable in its performance.  I read a lot of reviews and checked ratings on a popular consumer's website.  This Cyber-shot camera scored exceptionally high, better than any compact Canon.  I was looking for a basic point-and-shoot camera that would take great pictures, have some modes that allowed me to capture motion shots and indoor shots, and would also have a decent flash, that was smart enough to know when to go off and when not to.  I also like having a date stamp feature when I print out shots to help keep me organized.  This camera provided all of this and more.  It really has more features than I will ever use, but I have been playing around with them.  It has a soft skin mode that I am particularly fond of, since I posted a picture of myself on-line that I took in that mode and got several comments about how awesome I looked.  I did look fresher, and wrinkle free so that alone has sold me on this camera!  I am planning to post several of the pictures I have taken so you can get an idea of the quality of the pictures and feature.  Bare in mind I am NOT a professional photographer.  I am a mom of two kids, and a wife.  I am guessing someone with some actual photography talent could get a lot more out of this camera.  It has a Carl Zeiss lens, which might mean something to someone who knows a thing or two about cameras.  Some others have said the case is too big.  Based on those reviews I ordered a supposedly smaller case by GTMAX at the same time I ordered the camera, but it is basically the same size only flatter and hard-sided.  The case that comes in the pre-boxed set is soft-sided and therefore compresses down to almost the same flatness.  I am really happy I decided to give this Sony a try because it has exceeded all of my expectations.A few days later.....I have now used this camera over Spring Break and have something to report.  The touch screen really takes some getting used to, particularly if you are coming from a camera with buttons.  There were a few times I would acidentally switch it to a different mode just by holding it wrong.  Once I turned the screen icons off and switched it to movie at the same time and had a heck of a time getting it switched back to picture taking mode.  I still love all of the features and have posted just a few of the pictures I have taken with it.  I am reducing my original 5 stars down to 4 because I find the touch screen a bit difficult to get used to.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST COMPACT CAMERA EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: Buy this camera. I am only 13 and I am not a professional photographer, but this camera will blow your mind. The pictures it takes are fantastic, very sharp and high quality. There are tons of features and different modes to choose from when you are shooting, from nine super cool pictures effects to a background defocus that will blur the background of the picture and bring out the subject. Low light pictures are also excellent, but you might want to experiment with different modes to see which brings out the best picture. (For me it was anti- motion blur mode, which is also great for shooting action shots.)Video taken with this camera is also high quality and very smooth. Audio is very good as well. I only wish that you could shoot video under a picture effect mode, since the shooting modes on video are very limited. But be careful about shooting lots of high quality video- it takes up lots of space!Other things I liked about this camera was soft skin mode, the in- camera guide, and the playback function with music slideshows. When you are in playback mode, you can also add two picture effects, or paint on a picture with the given stylus. These are all just extra, but fun features!Is this camera easy to use? Sort of. It takes a little getting used to, and some experimenting to get the hang of things, but when you do, you won't be disappointed!One last thing about this camera is the fact that it doesn't have wifi, which I would like, because I love sharing the pictures I take on my iPad. However, you can buy and eye-fi memory card separately which can send pics and vids straight from your camera to an iPad.All in all, this is an awesome camera- I recommend to everyone!

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: This camera was highly rated. It is quite compact and easy to carry. The pictures it takes are not the best. Good focus is difficult to attain. One must have a very steady hand to avoid some blurriness. The lightness of the camera may be part of the challenge to avoid movement during a shot. Otherwise, it is very convenient to tote and use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Not that knowledgeable on cameras. I had 3 may goals. Good pictures with flash, quick response time on consecutive pictures and long battery life. Reviewed Consumer Reports didn't want to spend alot and this turned out to be perfect for us. Met my demands and I love the wt. of it. Haven't tried the video - wasn't really a priority when buying a camera.

Reviews.Title: good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Fred A. Robbins
Reviews.Content: I think I got my money's worth buying because of the price I tried this one. this camera. I have always bought cannon cameras but for the price I bought this one.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: jjc
Reviews.Content: Great little carry around camera.  Nice pictures and rear display on the camera.  It has the Carl Zeiss lens and has great performance even in low light conditions.  Make sure you get an extra battery.

Reviews.Title: Less noise.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Camera is good, much less noise than similar cameras, slow response compared to Panasonic + good lens. Color has become a blessing if you to like getting it cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Little Camera
Reviews.Author: jm
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything I hoped it would be, and more.  Features are very impressive and easy to find and use.  My favorite is the smiley face setting--won't take the picture until the subject is smiling.  Videos are impressive as well.  I had planned to purchase this and then would probably have to purchase a more expensive, and bulkier, camera, to get better pictures, but not necessary.  This one does the trick.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: LaShanda Bramlet
Reviews.Content: It has done exactly what I expected of it. I have gotten more than my moneys worth from it and the picture quality if pretty fair.

Reviews.Title: Great but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Marc D.
Reviews.Content: I was hoping the stabilization feature would help wityh some of our blurred shots but it was not a cure-all.  Still a great camera as always by Sony.

Reviews.Title: OK camera when the battery is fully and recently charged
Reviews.Author: dexter clem
Reviews.Content: My wife bought it.  The camera works reasonably well when the battery is charged, she said. But the camera is not ready when she wants to use it, as the battery won't stay charged after charging it up and letting it sit for a while.  I suggested that she charge it more frequently, even though she may not use it right away.  She shouldn't have to do this, as the specs say she can take 200 shots on a charged battery.  It should stay charged for at least a month and give at least one shot, shouldn't it, even though it hadn't been used in the meantime?  Just one or two shots per month on a charged up batteryis reasonable, isn't it?

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!
Reviews.Author: Melina Anderton
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's easy to use, takes awesome pictures, and is SO FAST at capturing hard to catch moments. I definitely recommend this entire setup. :)

Reviews.Title: nice camera, and size
Reviews.Author: Cristian H.
Reviews.Content: very good and cheap camera, take pictures of high quality, easy to use and comfortable design, what I expected from this camera

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Abbie
Reviews.Content: This camera is just fantastic! It has so many features packed into it that I barely know what to do with it! It also has a customizable sidebar for whichever mode your using you can customize which things you want to be a click away instead of having to go in depth to find it. The smile detection isn't as good as I'd have liked it to be, but the camera itself takes pictures fast enough so it sort of makes of for what it's lacking. I love the panorama mode its pretty sweet. Altogether I feel like I got this camera for a steal with everything it came with. Love it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: M Violette
Reviews.Content: Great price and value for an easy to use point and shoot camera with above average results for a small pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: A Fantastic Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Debbie Lee Wesselmann
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small, pocket-size camera that had enough features to make it useful in a lot of settings.  After a lot of research, I settled on this one.  I don't regret it at all.This camera replaced an older Sony, and it is superior in every way.  The photos are wonderful, and especially in automatic mode, you can't miss.  My husband and I went on vacation to Arizona with two cameras, one a bridge camera and the other this Sony.  Thank goodness we had this Sony with us.  The bridge camera, while capturing some great shots, missed more often because of user error/miscalculation, but almost every shot taken with the Sony turned out perfect.  The only drawback to this camera is the limited zoom.  It is more suited for snapshots than, say, nature photography.  The photos write quickly to the card, so there's no huge delay.  I also like that this has a rechargeable Li-On battery.  Our last Sony used regular batteries, and it chewed through them, often necessitating an emergency battery shopping trip.  We bought a spare battery so that's no longer an issue.  As others have noted, the case is too big, even with extra batteries and cards.  But, hey, it's a case, which is more than many manufacturers offer.This is a small, verging on tiny, camera that takes great photographs.  In its price class, I cannot imagine a better option.-- Debbie Lee Wesselmann

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camara
Reviews.Author: Josefa Sandoval
Reviews.Content: El producto excelente, Camara de muy buena calidad y es el descrito por el vendedor, la calidad del servicio excelente, envio rapido y eficaz.. recomiendo totalmente el vendedor y el producto.

Reviews.Title: easy, light, pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Mom of Two "Thea"
Reviews.Content: This camera worked well for packing light on a spring vaca with a family of 4.  So light it's easy to think it's not even in the case, and it was simple to take out of the box and start using with out reading the manual.  I used it at WDW for 2 long days of pictures and the battery needed to be charged the 3rd morning.  Lower quality (when cropping in tight etc.) then with DLS cameras, but worth the trade off of not having to drag around the big lens/heavier body.  Look forward to learning more about it's capabilities, but am so far happy with the Consumer Report review and the reasonable price for this Cyber-Shot.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Peridot Eyes
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use with a multitude of features.  I like the panoramic and 3D views.  Its excellent for  closeup photos and good for long distance shots..

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Paul F Trapani
Reviews.Content: Appears well made.  Easy to carry in a shirt pocket. Satisfied with the pictures I have taken so far.  Would recommend product. Initially had difficulty downloading to my computer, Sony personal walked me through my glitch and were outstanding!

Reviews.Title: The Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX70BDL Exceeds All Expectations
Reviews.Author: Alajacket
Reviews.Content: Incredible photo quality with phenomenal memory and video capabilities.  Our previous Sony Cyber-Shot was wonderful and this new-generation C-S puts the previous one to shame.  Ease of use, photo qualityand size are just perfect for us.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kari Whatley
Reviews.Content: This bundle was exactly what I wanted, was a great price, and shipped when it was supposed to. No complaints!

Reviews.Title: Good small camera
Reviews.Author: Jagga
Reviews.Content: Tiny, but exactly what I was looking for. Made for a great upgrade to my camera. Which the touch screen was a little bit more friendly and easier to use, as the response time and fludity isn;'t as smooth as expected, but otherwise a solid camera

Reviews.Title: Nice,, Tiny
Reviews.Author: Joseph A Anthony
Reviews.Content: I had an older modle and needed to replace it.. Was surprised as to how small the camera is.. It does take great pictures and is easy to use..

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: L. Cook
Reviews.Content: Super point and shoot camera.  Great quality photos and stabalization. Easy to use and the accessories package isvery convenient. It has everything to get started.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Haines
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera! So many features..very easy to use!Bought the pink one as it was the least expensive and the color is very nice!Very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: carllucas
Reviews.Content: Light weight,easy to use and takes great photos. Stores many photos.Highly reccommend this model to anyone looking at Sony cameras.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Victoria L. Harper
Reviews.Content: This camera has so many different possibilities.  The pictures are crystal clear.  I love it!  I have a picture of the city I live it, and it is frameworthy!  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: djbrown9
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect camera for me. Takes great pictures, very easy touse and compact. Found it via cnet.com

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Vincent S. & Barbara Orazio
Reviews.Content: This camera was highly recommended and performs at least as well as advertised.  I would recommend this to anyone that wants a small high quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, many options
Reviews.Author: LgGrams
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my husband for Christmas.  It is a bit smaller than his old Sony and size took a little getting used to.  However, he adapted quickly and has found several features he likes such as the zoom while videoing and being able to take a still while videoing.  Great pictures!!  Instructions are lacking for some of us who need them in print - for instance we have not been able to figure out just how the "paint pen" is supposed to work.  There is a picture edit feature w/in the camera, but since we do a lot of picture editing on the pc this will be what we use.  Also we have learned that the video type cannot be viewed on a Vista computer; has to be Windows 7, etc.  There are program out there to convert to other formats.  I am sure this camera has a great many other features that we will need to learn, but we were able to use right away with some basic settings.  My husband got some great pictures of Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber Shot
Reviews.Author: Tsippy
Reviews.Content: Small, fabulous, flexible  use camera... but somewhat difficult to set up use to its maximum capacity.Because of its many possible settings the pictures were exceptional from our last trip.

Reviews.Title: Works well - Color is to help keep track of it
Reviews.Author: M. Williamson
Reviews.Content: A replacement for a similar one that was lost (losing the little things is the greatest danger to cameras): the touch screen controls are different from prior Sony's but are ok to figure out. Works fine, decent quality pictures (haven't tried any fancy photography, though.

Reviews.Title: Its really small and cool!!
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I owned a Sony DSC-WX9 and I bought this to replace it ... Man! .. this is smaller than WX-9 and the look and feel is really nice.Its on the top 10 list at snapsort.com and the pictures come out really nice. Plenty of preset options for images and it has 3D sweep panorama .. the auto mode is good as well ..Overall, this small guy packs a punch...

Reviews.Title: SONY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Jerry L. Rochelle
Reviews.Content: I HAVE USED THIS CAMERA FOR A MONTH AND HALF. I HAVE BEEN VERY IMPRESSED WITH THE QUALITY OF PHOTOS. I WENT BACK AND BOUGHT 2 MORE FOR MY 2 DAUGHTERS. GREAT LITTLE CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Dinosaur2
Reviews.Content: My workhorse for the next couple years. Mmmmmmmm mmmmmmm mmmm mm mm mm mm mm m m m mmmm mm.

Reviews.Title: The Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX70BDL is a very good camera overall.
Reviews.Author: TerryTiger
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very good indoor flash pictures.  Indoor pictures without the flash are a little dark.  Long distance indoor pictures are not very clear especially if the subject is moving.  Outdoor pictures in day light are very good.  This camera has many usefull modes and features.  I have not been able to try them all yet.  Some of them include Anti Motion Blur, Date Stamp and Landscape.  This camera records HD video, but I have not recorded any yet.  This camera is very easy to use thanks to a large touch screen display that controls the cameras many modes and functions.  Also, this camera is equipped with a built-in instruction guide.  The next shot delay is very short.This camera is very compact and well made with a metal case and lens parts.  It is easy to take on trips.  It comes with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery pack that charges completely in 2 hours.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Nana O'Dell "Nana O'Dell"
Reviews.Content: I researched and wavered on which camera to purchase but I am glad I made this choice. It takes nice pictures and videos, is easy to use and understand, and a perfect size for taking anywhere I go.

Reviews.Title: Neither disappoints you, nor surprise...
Reviews.Author: moh3nnn
Reviews.Content: +The camera is pretty thin and lightweight, the touchscreen works well and looks nice.-I believe that despite what Sony claims, ISO Light sensitivity is much lower than 12800 in practice.-The pictures look nice when they are in 30 percent of their actual size in your computer screen; zooming in to 100 percent size might disappoint you though.-Sometimes In Panorama shooting mode, last fifth of the image becomes solid black, probably because of inappropriate/out of range movement of the camera.-The case have enough room for three of this camera, seriously.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING LITTLE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: SANDI MENCHAVEZ "MS. MURANO03"
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS LITTLE CAMERA AFTER OUR PREVIOUS CAMERA WENT ON THE BLINK.  PICTURES ARE VERY CLEAR, THE CAMERA IS EQUIPPED W/STEP BY STEP "HOW TO'S" WHICH MAKE IT EASY TO USE.  FOR THE PRICE, THIS CAMERA IS WORTH EVERY DOLLAR SPENT & MORE...PERFECT!

Reviews.Title: NEW CAMERA
Reviews.Author: MAMA "CM"
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA SEEMS TO BE EVERYTHING PROMISED.  I'M VERY IMPRESSED WITH THE QUALITY OF DIGITAL PHOTOS.  MY OLYMPUS POINT AND SHOOT WAS SLOWING DOWN SO I WANTED SOMETHING RELIABLE FOR AN UPCOMING VACATION.  IT IS SOMEWHAT COMPLICATED TO USE BUT I'M SURE WITH SOME PRACTICE IT WILL DO EVERYTHING IT CLAIMS TO DO.  IT'S SMALL SIZE SUITS ME HOWEVER SOMEONE WITH LARGE HANDS MAY HAVE TROUBLE WITH IT.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jing
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera with very user friendly features and good quality. I like it very much and recommend to buy others as well.

Reviews.Title: GUARANTEE DOESN'T APPLICATE IN OTHER COUNTRY
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: This is my history about the purchase... I received the camera on my country (Venezuela) and everything looks really fine! the box was sealed, the contain on the package too; I start with the camera inmediatly, works really good but after this first use, it doesn't turn on anymore. I went to the sony at my city and the guarantee cannot been applicated in this case because the purchase was in other region. The provider (Video & Audio Center) only recognize the guarantee if I call to Sony USA... Now what?... Is that credible?

ProductInfo.Features:
3D Still Image and 3D Sweep Panorama mode
Includes 4GB SD Card
Includes carrying case
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX70BDL 16.2MP CMOS Digital Camera with 4 GB Memory Card and Case (Pink) (2012 Model)
